verses.text: \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, what is come upon us: \w consider|strong="H5027"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* our \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.
Our \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* is \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* to \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*, our \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* to \w aliens|strong="H5237"\w*.
We are \w orphans|strong="H3490"\w* and \w fatherless|strong="H0369"\w*, our \w mothers|strong="H0517"\w* \add are\add* as \w widows|strong="H0490"\w*.

We have \w drunken|strong="H8354"\w* our \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*; our \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* is \w sold|strong="H0935"\w* unto us.\f + \fr 5.4 \ft is…: Heb. cometh for price\f*

Our \w necks|strong="H6677"\w* \add are\add* under \w persecution|strong="H7291"\w*: we \w labour|strong="H3021"\w*, \add and\add* have no \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*.\f + \fr 5.5 \ft Our…: Heb. On our necks are we persecuted\f*

We have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add to\add* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, \add and to\add* the \w Assyrians|strong="H0804"\w*, to be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.
Our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \add and are\add* \w not|strong="H0369"\w*; and we have \w borne|strong="H5445"\w* their \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.
\w Servants|strong="H5650"\w* have \w ruled|strong="H4910"\w* over us: \add there is\add* none that doth \w deliver|strong="H6561"\w* \add us\add* out of their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

We \w gat|strong="H0935"\w* our \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* with \add the peril of\add* our \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

Our \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* was \w black|strong="H3648"\w* like an \w oven|strong="H8574"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w terrible|strong="H2152"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*.\f + \fr 5.10 \ft terrible: or, terrors, or, storms\f*

They \w ravished|strong="H6031"\w* the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \add and\add* the \w maids|strong="H1330"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w Princes|strong="H8269"\w* are hanged \w up|strong="H8518"\w* by their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: the \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* of \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* were not \w honoured|strong="H1921"\w*.
They \w took|strong="H5375"\w* the young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* to \w grind|strong="H2911"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H5288"\w* \w fell|strong="H3782"\w* under the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.
The \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* have \w ceased|strong="H7673"\w* from the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, the young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* from their \w musick|strong="H5058"\w*.
The \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* of our \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w ceased|strong="H7673"\w*; our \w dance|strong="H4234"\w* is \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* into \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*.

The \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \add from\add* our \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: \w woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto us, that we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*!\f + \fr 5.16 \ft The…: Heb. The crown of our head is fallen\f*
For this our \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w faint|strong="H1739"\w*; for these \add things\add* our \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* are \w dim|strong="H2821"\w*.
Because of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, which is \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, the \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* upon it.

Thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w remainest|strong="H3427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* from \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

Wherefore dost thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* us for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*, \add and\add* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* us so \w long|strong="H0753"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*?\f + \fr 5.20 \ft so…: Heb. for length of days?\f*

\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* thou us unto thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and we shall be \w turned|strong="H7725"\w*; \w renew|strong="H2318"\w* our \w days|strong="H3117"\w* as of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*.

But thou hast \w utterly|strong="H3988"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* us; thou art \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* against us.\f + \fr 5.22 \ft But…: or, For wilt thou utterly reject us?\f*
